item.title: By: Joseph
item.dc:creator: Joseph
item.description: Whatever you do, don't miss it! Had I known about it earlier, I would have come from Boston to NY to hear him.
item.content:encoded: Whatever you do, don’t miss it! Had I known about it earlier, I would have come from Boston to NY to hear him.
